short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time manage and limit daily time spent on websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ManageMe is a Chrome extension that allows users to manage the time they spend on different websites in a simple yet flexible way. Simply specify a website and the daily limit of time that is allowed on it, and the domain will be blocked once time spent on it has expired.

Features:
 • Add, delete, and pause timers for any website domain
 • Block off sites completely by specifying the allowed time as 0
 • Expired timers block off the site for the remainder of the day
 • Timers reset at midnight
